rich-terms-of-usage-notice.text: By signing in to Miitti App, you accept our

auth-subtitle: Nice to meet you, time to upgrade your social life?
first-auth-welcome-subtitle:
Would you next like to finish your
profile or take a tour of the app?
complete-profile-skip-notice:
Please note that you cannot access most
features until your profile is completed.
delete-account-confirmation-text: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All your information will be permanently erased. This action cannot be undone.
input-name-disclaimer: You're unique so remember to use only your own infromation.
invalid-name-missing: Please enter your name above to proceed.
input-email-disclaimer: We never use your email for marketing without your permission!
input-birthday-disclaimer: We use this to calculate your age
invalid-birthday-missing: Please enter your birthday above to proceed.
invalid-birthday-too-young: You must be at least 18 years old to use Miitti App.
invalid-birthday-too-old: Are you sure you picked the right century?
invalid-birthday-input: Invalid birthday. Check that the formatting is correct: DD/MM/YYYY
input-gender-title: Which gender do you identify with?
input-gender-disclaimer: Your gender does not define you but with it we are able to better recommend suitable miittis for you! This will not be visible for others.
invalid-gender-missing: Please choose one of the options above to proceed.
input-languages-disclaimer: Select all that you are comfortable communicating in.
invalid-languages-missing: Please select at least one language above to proceed.
input-area-disclaimer: Select the overall area where you currently reside. Miitti App is officially available only in Finland at the moment.
invalid-area-missing: Please select at least one location above to proceed.
invalid-area-too-many: You can only select up to 3 locations.
input-occupational-status-title: What is your current occupational status?
input-occupational-status-disclaimer: This helps us to better understand your lifestyle and recommend suitable miittis for you!
invalid-occupational-status-too-many: You can only select up to 3 options.
invalid-occupational-status-missing: Please choose one of the options above to proceed.
input-organization-title: Which organization are you affiliated with?
input-organization-disclaimer: This helps us to better understand your lifestyle and recommend suitable miittis for you!
invalid-organization-missing: Please choose one of the options above to proceed.
input-qa-cards-disclaimer: Choose 1 - 10 Q&A cards to answer in order tell others more about yourself. You can always change your answers later.
invalid-qa-cards-missing: Please answer to at least one Q&A card above to proceed.
input-qa-card-answer-disclaimer: Submit an empty answer to delete your answer.
input-profile-picture-disclaimer: This is the first thing others see about you. Choose a picture that represents you well.
invalid-profile-picture-missing: Please choose a profile picture that clearly shows your face in order to proceed.
input-activities-title: What kind of activities are you interested in?
input-activities-disclaimer: Select all that you are interested in. This helps us to better recommend suitable miittis for you!
invalid-activities-missing: Please select at least one activity above to proceed.
accept-push-notifications-disclaimer: We will send you notifications about new miittis, messages and other important updates.
accept-push-notifications-dialog-text: You will not receive notifications about new miittis, messages, invitations, requests or other important updates.
accept-push-notifications-dialog-error: You have to allow notifications from your device settings in order to receive notifications from Miitti App.
accept-norms-disclaimer: Agree to the below community norms in order to proceed by reading and clicking all of them.
invalid-norms-missing: Please agree to all the terms above to proceed.
update-recommended-text: We recommend you update to the latest version of Miitti App for the best experience.
update-required-text: You must update to the latest version of Miitti App to continue using the app.
maintenance-break-title: Miitti App is currently under maintenance.
maintenance-break-text: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
invalid-activity-join-anonymous: You need to finish your profile before you can join activities. Finish your profile in the profile settings.
invalid-activity-requested: You have already requested to join this activity.
activity-request-error: Could not send request. The activity may have been deleted. Refresh the list and try again.
report-activity-disclaimer: Reporting is entirely anonymous and cannot be traced back to you. In case of ongoing illegal activity, call 112.
report-profile-disclaimer: Reporting is entirely anonymous and cannot be traced back to you.
invalid-report-missing-reason: Please choose at least one reason above to proceed.
delete-activity-confirm-text: Are you sure you want to delete this activity? This action cannot be undone.
leave-activity-confirm-text: Are you sure you want to leave this activity? If you change your mind, you can join or ask to join again later.
anonymous-dialog-text: It looks like your profile is still incomplete. You need to finish your profile before you can access this feature. Shall we finish it now?
anonymous-dialog-disclaimer: You can also finish your profile later from your profile settings.
anonymous-screen-text: You have not finished your profile, so you cannot access all features. Finish your profile in the profile settings.
invalid-activity-category-missing: Please choose a category above to proceed.
create-activity-details-title: What would you like to tell about your activity?
create-activity-details-title-placeholde: The concise title of your activity
create-activity-details-description-plac: What else would you like to tell about your activity?
create-activity-free-to-attend-toggle: Free to join, requires no paid tickets
invalid-activity-fields-missing: Please fill in all the fields above to proceed.
invite-screen-title: Want to invite someone already or let them find you on their own?
filter-users-same-area-label: Show only users in the same area
filter-users-max-interests-error: You can only select up to 10 interests
